amendment.description: Amendment strikes a requirement for a report to Congress on the impact of information technology research funded by certain FY 2000 appropriations bills.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to strike a requirement for a report to Congress on the impact of information technology research funded by certain FY 2000 appropriations bills.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capuano amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
